sentences.en: After much hard bargaining we reached an agreement.
sentences.cn: 经过一番艰难的讨价还价，我们达成了协议。

sentences.en: Escalation has conceptual affinities with bargaining theory.
sentences.cn: 逐步升级同交易理论在概念上具有相似性.

sentences.en: He had him now . " Twelve's my price , " Hearn barked. " I'm not bargaining. "
sentences.cn: 上钩了! 侯恩就斩钉截铁地说: “ 我顶多出十二镑, 不跟你讨价还价. ”

sentences.en: He reiterated his position that nuclear weapons could not be used as international bargaining chips.
sentences.cn: 他一再重申他的立场,认为核子武器不可以用来当作国际谈判的筹码.

sentences.en: He was bargaining with the salesman.
sentences.cn: 他在与销售员讨价还价.

sentences.en: I'm bargaining on your help to drive us to the airport.
sentences.cn: 我指望着你开车送我们到机场.

sentences.en: Rubio suggests that oil be used as a bargaining chip in any trade talks.
sentences.cn: 鲁比奥建议把石油当作所有贸易谈判的筹码。

sentences.en: Some wore the cunning look of bargaining and plotting.
sentences.cn: 有些人带着斤斤计较和苦心经营的诡诈面孔.

sentences.en: That was the cue for several months of intense bargaining.
sentences.cn: 那意味着几个月的激烈谈判开始了。

sentences.en: The 4% pay raise was the result of some hard bargaining .
sentences.cn: 4%的加薪是经过一番艰苦谈判后才取得的结果。

sentences.en: The dealer spent hours bargaining for the painting.
sentences.cn: 那个商人为购买那幅画花了几个小时讨价还价.

sentences.en: The information could be used as a bargaining chip to extract some parallel information from Britain.
sentences.cn: 这个情报可以当作筹码，从英国人那里换取等价的消息。

sentences.en: The new missiles will be useful as a bargaining counter in the arms control talks.
sentences.cn: 新导弹在控制军备谈判中作为讨价还价的筹码将很有用处.

sentences.en: They prefer to bargain with individual clients, for cash.
sentences.cn: 他们更愿意同个人客户洽谈，做现金交易。

sentences.en: This principle of collective bargaining has been a mainstay in labor relations in this country.
sentences.cn: 这一集体谈判原则已经成为该国劳动关系的重要基础。

sentences.en: To the leaders of organized labor the fundamental issue was protection of right of collective bargaining.
sentences.cn: 对于有组织的劳工领袖来说,基本问题是保护集体谈判的权力.

sentences.en: Together with other unions, the Knights of Labor tried to make changes through collective bargaining.
sentences.cn: 与其他工会一起, 劳工骑士试图通过一系列协商作出改善.

trans.tran_en: discussion in order to reach an agreement about a sale, contract etc

trans.tran_cn: 讨价还价，商谈( bargain的现在分词 )，提出条件，要求得到
trans.tran_en: When people bargain with each other, they discuss what each of them will do, pay, or receive
